EEEEK!!! I'll take ghosts any day over spiders.

  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday=
, May 17, 2009 1:02 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,






 =
 Well, there's spiders tooooo!

   F-S


  On Fri, May 15, 2009 at 8:07 PM,=
 Diane Mehrez <deemehrez@...> wrote:





    Lol Frank, so it's just=
 moldy?




---------------------------------------------------------------=
-------------
    From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
    To: =
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    Sent: Thursday, May 14, 2009 6:02:27 PM
    Sub=
ject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Just wondering,



    My basement isn't dark!

   =
  F-S


    On Thu, May 14, 2009 at 5:55 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@y=
ahoo. com> wrote:





      Well I guess I am really directing this to Fra=
nk since he recently said that people that go to grave yards have some "hol=
lywoodistic" type of "lost" mind set :) And I did kind of "hint" that the B=
oxes are BS (they don't work for me) but my words were more a of a PLAY on =
anothers "emotion" (his) so he would feel singled out....as he did when he =
put a LABEL on the people that "do" go to grave yards. And to call me "anot=
her seriouse researcher" is just plain argumentive, as it seems to look lik=
e that is his only way to express himself..... As for going to a "moldy dar=
k besement next" I do recall that is where HE said he does his research :) =
Sheeesh..... .--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, Frank Sumption <purplealieng=
irl@ ...> wrote:
      >
      > So you're saying the boxes are BS, and one=
 has to use the "pure" methods?
      > Maybe you should try some moldy dar=
k besement next. Sheeesh, yet another
      > "serious researcher"!
      >=
 
      > F-S
      > 

      > On Thu, May 14, 2009 at 12:04 PM, James W. =
Hyslope <clockdryve@. ..>wrote: 

      > 
      > >
      > >
      > > I =
for one am new at this...but doesn't mean I take this field very lightly.
 =
     > > I have recorded once (so far) in a Cemetery...and I took the whole=
 idea
      > > "seriously", and with RESPECT. I can say for a FACT--that t=
he voices I
      > > receive are "genuine" and not audible before playback=
...that to me is more
      > > desirable (and credible) than some that tak=
e "bits and pieces" of a radio
      > > program to try and place the infor=
mation into a "question" or "answer" then
      > > try and sell (my unique=
) way of reaching the unseen. And for the 2 weeks
      > > that I have bee=
n doing this...I seem to have gotten some amazing results
      > > with my=
 "recorder" type technique. I am getting playful spirits, sadness,
      > =
> needy voices, anger, laughter, my first name spoken, possibly contacted m=
y
      > > mother twice (unless is a trickster spirit)...so to say "someon=
e" does this
      > > in a form (that others don't approve)?? None of us a=
re experts yet...so we
      > > will look for ANYTHING to try and find the=
 correct "angle" that works for us
      > > :) Even if it includes an old =
Cemetery or working off the "Broadcast Band
      > > Radio Waves" to shack=
 up some type of sentence. I don't know...who has more
      > > "throw awa=
y" audio?? I know ALL of my EVP is "unique".....I for one have
      > > tr=
ied the "radio" type of EVP. I tried 2 Shack Mods...no joy here people.
   =
   > > For me "I saw it at face value" after just a few minutes. I don't me=
an to
      > > offend. But I didn't step "first". Now who can say (for cer=
tain) WHO has the
      > > better form? What ever gets us closer to oursel=
ves, and our lost FRIEND'S.
      > > That's ALL that matters man :) PS...I=
 am a 46 year old male from Iowa. I
      > > have died and went to the tun=
nel (when I was 18)...was told "not my time to
      > > go" by a male voic=
e that echoed (in the darkness). I have seen 3 UFO's in V
      > > formati=
on (during Heavens Gate) *2nd comet of that year (here in Iowa) I
      > >=
 have seen 1 "shadow" person (take 1 step and vanish) touched a ghost (snuc=
k
      > > up on it)...got a burn on tip of my finger where I reached out =
to touch top
      > > of it's head (entity was small like child). I have d=
eveloped 1 xray plate
      > > with my finger tips to make multiple white =
spots in the film-over 20 spots
      > > (naval medical officer was angry =
when he saw them) hahaha...he didn't know I
      > > did it when his back =
was turned :) Lot's of fun out here Guy's (and GALS)
      > > let's try an=
d not point fingers now.....Knowbody should feel like they are
      > > si=
ngled out here...like I said "none of us "here" have ALL the answers". So
 =
     > > I'm not a total "Newbie"...but I will try a grace yard again somed=
ay. And I
      > > would hope that people will respect me as well as I...o=
f those IN that Grave

      > > Yard. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com <EVP=
-ITC%40yahoogroups. com>, "April 

      > > Abercrombie" <april@> wrote:
 =
     > > >
      > > > Maybe some ghost hunters assume this, but not us gho=
st hunters who take
      > > our field very seriously.
      > > >

 > > ----- Original Message -----

      >=
 > > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups. com>

Sent: Wednesday, May 13, 2009 7:15 PM

st wondering,

      > > >
      > > >
 =

t that the dead would
      > > be where they died, or were burried, a Holl=
ywoodism I think. I record in my
      > > basement.
      > > >
      > > =
> F-S
      > > >
      > > >
      > > > On Wed, May 13, 2009 at 7:07 PM, =
<SnowfireL@> wrote:

se to explore. Why don't they go
